original_text: And he made fifty clasps of gold, and coupled the curtains one to the other with clasps. So the tabernacle was a single whole.
korean_text: 금 갈고리 쉰 개를 만들어 그 갈고리로 두 휘장을 연결하여 한 막을 이루었더라

sentences.original_text: And he made fifty clasps of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 금으로 쉰 개의 죔쇠를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and coupled the curtains one to the other with clasps
So the tabernacle was a single whole
